class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.Procedure
class.comment: Table to store the procedure/sensor. Mapping file: mapping/core/Procedure.hbm.xml

column.name: procedureId
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: procedureDescriptionFormatId
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the procedureDescriptionFormat table. Describes the format of the procedure description.

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The identifier of the procedure, gml:identifier. Used as parameter for queries. Unique

column.name: codespace
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the procedure, gml:name. Optional

column.name: codespaceName
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:name codespace. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the procedure, gml:description. Optional

column.name: deleted
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this procedure is deleted or not (OGC SWES 2.0 - DeleteSensor operation)

column.name: disabled
column.comment: For later use by the SOS. Indicator if this procedure should not be provided by the SOS.

column.name: descriptionFile
column.comment: Field for full (XML) encoded procedure description or link to a procedure description file. Optional

column.name: referenceFlag
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this procedure is a reference procedure of another procedure. Not used by the SOS but by the Sensor Web REST-API

column.name: typeOf
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to procedure table. Optional, contains procedureId if this procedure is typeOf another procedure

column.name: isType
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this procedure is a type description, has no observations.

column.name: isAggregation
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this procedure is an aggregation (e.g. System, PhysicalSystem).

column.name: mobile
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this procedure is stationary (false) or mobile (true). Optional

column.name: insitu
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this procedure is insitu (true) or remote (false). Optional

set.name: childs
set.comment: Relation table to store procedure hierarchies. E.g. define a parent in a query and all childs are also contained in the response. Mapping file: mapping/transactional/TProcedure.hbm.xml

column.name: parentSensorId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related parent procedure. Contains "procedure".procedureid

column.name: childSensorId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related child procedure. Contains "procedure".procedureid
